about_the_game:
Original 8 soundtracks composed by Alexandr Zhelanov, Dmitry Lutinov and Evgeny Guliugin.
Available in FLAC and MP3 128 kbps format.

Tracklist:
1 Battle Theme 1 — Alexandr Zhelanov
2 Battle Theme 2 — Alexandr Zhelanov
3 Battle Theme 3 — Alexandr Zhelanov
4 Battle Theme 4 — Alexandr Zhelanov
5 Battle Theme 5 — Alexandr Zhelanov
6 Blindrain — Dmitry Lutinov
7 Etud 16 — Evgeny Guliugin
8 Etud 22 — Evgeny Guliugin
